 #include "front_panel/led_control.h"

Definition in file led_control.h.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum enum_led_ptt_state

PTT led state.

Enumerator:
LED_STATE_PTT_ACTIVE  Used to set the LED to PTT active color.
LED_STATE_PTT_INHIBIT  Used to set the LED to INHIBIT color.
LED_STATE_PTT_OK  Used to set the LED to PTT OK color (which means that it is OK to transmit).

Definition at line 27 of file led_control.h.

enum enum_led_state

Regular LED state.

Enumerator:
LED_STATE_ON  Used to set the LED as ON.
LED_STATE_OFF  Used to set the LED as OFF.

Definition at line 37 of file led_control.h.
